column5: This lake front, 5 bdr, 4.5 bathroom home is all you need to do the big game right. It boasts two master suites, two family rooms, formal dining, piano room, study. 4 televisions, games, a pool, large patio with outside sink and grill, luxury kitchen, pool table, elliptical machine, and much much more. Kick back, relax, and enjoy your trip. BRING THE FAMILY AND KIDS OR COME AND PARTY WITH YOUR FRIENDS.
